item.title: tcardgenでHugoで作ったブログのOGPを自動生成してみた
item.description: tcardgen で自動生成されるかどうかの test です script if [ $# != 1 ] || [ $1 = "" ]; then echo "One parameters are required" echo "" echo "string: path to markdown file of target post" echo "" echo "example command" echo "\t$sh ./scripts/gen_ogp.sh ./content/post/test/test.md" exit fi TARGET_POST_PATH=$1 tcardgen \ --fontDir ./static/fonts/Kinto_Sans \ --output static/images/og \ --template static/ogp/template.png \ --config tcardgen.yaml \ $TARGET_POST_PATH
